Data

nsParams

Species specific parameters for the North Sea

interNS

Interaction matrix for the North Sea

catchAvg

averaged catch in the North Sea 2014 - 2019

Fmat

ICES fisheries mortality

FmatWeightedInterpolated

ICES fisheries mortality processed On the ICES database, some species have multiple entries and some have none. Fisheries mortality is weighted by the species abundance to be able to take into account multiple database entries Gurnard data is extrapolated from whiting (same gear and physiology) ....

HTM1_sim

HTM1 final simulation saved (sim_guessed) Used at the beginning of HTM2

HTM2_Fmsy1

HTM2 Fmsy plot file (step 2 - Fmsy1 plot_dat) plotFmsy() runs slowly so saving the result for fast kniting

HTM2_Fmsy2

HTM2 Fmsy plot file (step 2 - Fmsy2 plot_dat) plotFmsy() runs slowly so saving the result for fast knitting

HTM2_optimParallel_Rmax1

HTM2 optim parallel output (step 1 - optim_result) The Rmax vector output of optim parallel is saved for fast knitting ....

HTM2_optimParallel_Rmax2

HTM2 optim parallel output (step 2 - optim_loop) The Rmax vector output of optim parallel is saved for fast knitting ....

HTM2_sim_optim1

HTM2 saved simulation (step 1 - results) Used as checkpoint/kick start if .rmd are not run from the beginning ....

HTM2_sim_optim2

HTM2 saved simulation (step 2 - tweaked erepro) Used as checkpoint/kick start if .rmd are not run from the beginning ....

HTM2_sim_optim3

HTM2 saved simulation (step 2 - sim_loop) Used as checkpoint/kick start if .rmd are not run from the beginning ....

Shiny apps

shiny_erepro()

shiny app to tweak erepro

shiny_fmsy()

shiny app to tweak erepro per species and see the effects on Fmsy

shiny_gamma()

shiny app to tweak gamma per species and see the effects on growth

shiny_kappa()

shiny app to tweak gamma per species and see the effects on growth
